Forms Contact Us Veteran Student Test Credit & Placement Check Your Application Status Admitted Students Deadlines Immunization Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>Admission & Aid>Financial Aid>Contact Us Contact Us ​​​​ Visit our OneDePaul help and support portal Visit us in person at OneDePaul Additional Contact Information Financial Aid Team Veteran Students The Office of Veterans AffairsLoop Campus OfficeDePaul Center, Suite 6070Monday-Friday, 9 a.m. - 5 p.m.Phone: (312) 362-5656Email:veteransaffairs@depaul.edu Lincoln Park OfficeStudent Center, Room 310Phone: (773) 325-7088 Submitting forms and documentation Financial aid forms and documentation can be uploaded using our secure onlineFinancial Aid Document Submission form. Students and parents can use this form to submit documents to the Office of Financial Aid and registration on the site is not required. Make sure all documents uploaded have required signatures. Do not upload password-protected documents or video/audio files. Forms and documentation can also be submitted in person at OneDePaul.
